name: bullets
description: A minimal presentation tool built with Elm

scripts.install-libs: mkdir -p vendor && curl -L https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/pptxgenjs@3.12.0/dist/pptxgen.bundle.js -o vendor/pptxgen.bundle.js && curl -L https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jszip/3.10.1/jszip.min.js -o vendor/jszip.min.js
